title: Week 9 Quiz: Audit & Compliance
description: Test your understanding of auditing procedures and reporting styles.

items.prompt: Which of these is an example of 'Vouching'?
options: Comparing a bank entry with a receipt
items.explanation: Vouching involves comparing recorded entries with original evidence.

options: Which errors are significant enough to report
The colors for the annual report
items.explanation: Materiality focuses on what matters to the stakeholders.

items.prompt: Complete the formal report sentence: 'The internal controls ___ found to be inadequate.'
items.explanation: Plural subject 'controls' requires 'were' in the passive.

items.prompt: A 'statutory audit' is one that is:
items.explanation: Statutory means prescribed or required by statute (law).

options: The company's board of directors or management
items.explanation: Internal auditors are an internal function serving the organization's governance.
